????:

A slight signal started to appear in Pacificus's chanel
  ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
  From: rm2kmidi 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent:=
 Friday, July 08, 2005 7:30 PM
  Subject: Pasificus Maximals


  NPCS:

  T=
here is darkness.  Small lights flicker in the distance, some tired
  groan=
ing and shuffling of feet.  Lord Perseus stands to his feet, and
  thinks o=
f something to say.

  "Who's out there?  Is everyone allright?"

  The fli=
ckering lights move closer.  They dont' say a word.

  "Friend or Foe?"

  =
He is now surrounded by at least 3 pairs of lights.

  "Who is that?" asked=
 a voice in the darkness.

  "I mean you no harm, I just awoke here and I h=
ave no idea what is going on."

  "I think we all just woke up not 20 minut=
es ago.  We were trying to
  find a way out of this room, or cave.   We're =
not certain where we
  are.  Perhaps you can help us."

  "I guess that's w=
ould be the prudent thing to do; first let me know
  your names?  I'm Perse=
us"

  "...."

  "Or not..... I guess you're not up for a converstation.  O=
k, lets
  search every wall and try to find what kind of room this is.  OK?=
"

  There was a grunt in agreement, then everyone spread out.
